product_description: These denim shorts made with Tencel® lyocell and organic cotton feature a relaxed fit and fraying cuffed hems for a cool, boyish look.
product_details_and_care:
These denim shorts made with Tencel® lyocell and organic cotton feature a relaxed fit and fraying cuffed hems for a cool, boyish look.
7" inseam, 24" leg opening; 12" front rise; 15 1/2" back rise (size 29)
Button fly
Five-pocket style
60% organic cotton, 40% Tencel lyocell or 41% Tencel lyocell, 41% recycled cotton, 18% organic cotton
Tencel lyocell is a sustainably produced fiber made with closed-loop processing
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #6036518
